description: we have been out now almost 3 Weeks, having spent some time in Derbyshire among the Gentry there to whom we were recommended...
Calling here just now, I find a Bag not taken away...
I have just received yours of the 29th past.
We arrived here well last Night, only a little fatigued with the last Days Journey, being 70 Miles.
You are very prudent not to engage in Party Disputes. Women never should meddle with them except in Endeavours to reconcile their Husbands...
I have wrote you a long Letter of 3 Sheets per Duncan...
We move this Day for Gnadenhutten.
Peter was taken ill with a Fever and Pain in his Side before I got to Newcastle - I had him blooded there...
I wrote to you via New York the Day after my Arrival, acquainting you that I had a fine Journey and Passage down the Bay...

We got well over here last Night about 8 aClock.
am glad to hear that the Companies are forming in Town and chusing their Officers, and hope the Example will be followed throughout the Country.

I have been now near 6 Weeks waiting for the Sailing of the Pacquet...
